Key Match Events: OUT! L.B.W. Charith Asalanka to Arshdeep Singh. Off break length ball, outside off stump on the front foot slog sweeping, hit pad.
OUT! L.B.W. Charith Asalanka to Shivam Dube. Off break length ball, outside off stump on the front foot defending, hit pad.
FOUR! Charith Asalanka to Shivam Dube. Off break length ball, outside off stump on the back foot cutting, well timed past deep extra cover for 4 runs.
SIX! Wanindu Hasaranga to Shivam Dube. Leg spinner length ball, outside off stump on the front foot Slog, well timed in the air under control over long on for 6 runs.
